alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 3:52PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Johnson County through 415 PM MDT... At 351 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms 12 miles northeast of Buffalo, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Johnson County, including the following locations... Buffalo Johnson County Airport and Johnson County Fairgrounds. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between mile markers 298 and 299. Interstate 90 between mile markers 55 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
